text:
Khadelwal bhai ye bta na, Khandelwal yaar ye karwaade bhai plzz.

Yahi se apni majority calls chaalu hoti thi, hmesha helping bnda raha jb bhi jrurt pdi chahe academics ya aur bhi kuch, mast bnda hai bro tu. Chill type ekdm, kbhi kbhi thoda satak jaata tha jb exams me fatti thi, but tune 1st sem se leke end tak har point pe helping hand bdhaaye rkha.

Wo DS ki assignments me help krna, MTH ke courses me to tu hai hi chaapu londa XD, bas milna vilna ni hopaaya since this lockdown, but chill hai na milte hain kbhi mast, bakchodi treat sb hogi bro.

Baaki to kya hi bolu, one of the most amazing people I met in college.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Broooo !!!

You are one of the best people I met. Ekdm chill type, haan but exams me alag fati rehti thi XD. Memories hain to kaafi, but jo kaafi sahi thi wo thi jb train me aa rhe the, tu mai aur Shrey aur paas me uncle aunty baithe the aur ek ldkiyo ka group tha, to hum ekdm decent ban rhe aur soch rhe ki koi gaali ni dega, but at the end maine hi sbse pehle di LOL.

Photographer mast hai bro tu, one of the best pics meri tune hi click kr rkhi hai. Also, treats kaafi pending hain, milte hain jldi aur krta hain bro enjoy !!
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Adi Bro !!!
Sach me Bro hi hai tu, har acche se mulaakat to apni 2nd year me hi hui thi, but mulaakat ke baad to jo mast time spend kiya na bro, sath me bitching karna, Sath me ghumna, Gym jaana, treats pe jaana, tumhaare room me hi to aake pada rehta tha mai XD.

Fir uske baad lockdown hua to fir har baat me apan ne discuss krna ki yaar ye aise ni hoga kya, fir apni BAATEIN, you know konsi baatein, BRO TALKS, kaafi sahi memories bnaayi hain yaar. Umeed hai aage bhi bnayenge hi, milte hain jldi AJMER me ðŸ˜‰ðŸ˜‚.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Goel bhaiya, kya haal !!!

Mulaakat kaise hui thi kuch yaad hai kya, yaad sa ni aa raha. Aaye to btaana, but mulaakat ke baad jo sath me library me baithke padhna, treats ke liye sudden plans bnaana aur execute bhi karna unn plans ko XD, sab kaafi mast memories hain.

Baaki to tum ho hi apne chaapu londe, har point pe help ki tune, aur sirf help to nahi, uske alaawa bhi bhai jo random kaand krte ghumte the all were worth it. Umeed hai jldi milenge aur aise hi contact bnaaye rkhna. KAAFI TREATS AND BAKCHODI AWAITING !!
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Bhai bhai !!

Kaafi mast banda lga tha tu jb pehli baar mile the, waise bas mess me normal greetings aur kbhi kbhi halki fulki baat ke alawa jyda kuch time spend hua ni. But jitna bhi pta tha ye tha ki you are among one of the best people. Hoping to meet sometime soon. Take care !
author: Aayush  Sharma

text: Bro, apni mulaakat shayad aise hi hui thi kisi course ki discussion me aur uske baad to tu BRO ban gya haha. KD ke computer lab me baithke terese doubts puchna, assignment krna. Although apni koi bakchodi waali memories nhi ban paayi but tu hmesha kaafi mast banda raha bro, har baat me tune help krna, online sem me bhi, offline sem bhi, mtlb kbhi aisa nhi tha ki we lost contact. Ab yhi umeed hai ki contact bna rhega, though tu 1 saal aur rhega campus me, but chill hai jldi milenge.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Atul Bro !!
Jitna yaad aa raha shayad pehli baar SPO placements ke time mile the jb apan company coordinators bne the, bhai kaafi bakchodi krte ghumte the uss time to. Fir tu BT deta tha unn dino me coding krta tha aur mai room pe aake mast movies dekhta tha lol.

Fir uske baad to assignments vgrh bhejke ek dusre ki g**nd marne se bchaana, exams me to mast tepa hi hai. Tu kaafi sahi banda mila IITK me and I hope aage bhi we remain in contact.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Bhai bhai !! Kya haal
As such mujhe jyada kuch yaad aa ni raha apni memories me, but itna jrur yaad hai ki apan shyd Antaragni ya kisi aur cheej ke through mile the. Kaafi sahi tha, thoda hi sahi but jitna bhi time spend kiya regarding assignments ya exams.

Hope to meet you soon. Tab take chill maarooo
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Arey JAIN SAAB !! Kya haal, bro tu to shuru se hi sath raha hai, pehle hall ki wjh se, fir MTH ki wjh se, fir Antaragni me bhi thoda to kiya tha kaam, though baad me maine fraud maar liya LOL.

Baaki hai tu ekdm mast banda, chill type, classes to jaata hi kon tha, book se padhta tha tu aur hum jo class jaate the baad me humaari help kiya krta tha. "Bhai Jain mere bagal me aake baith jaana, complex me tu hi niklwayega, mujhe ni aata XD". Always a helpful and chaapu ofcourse.

DHAWAL KI CCD TREAT" reh gyi yaar, wo jrur leni hai, aur bhi kaafi treats vgrh pending hain bro especially placement waali. Milte hain bro, mast mze krenge, apna group milega to alag hi bakchodi hogi.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Shrotriya, ye btaade bc
Shrotriya se pucho na, usne sab pdh rkha hai.
Shrotriya assignment krade yaar, lagi pdi hai

Bhai, sbse chhota tha hmaare group me, but sbse jyda bakchod, dimaag tumhaara tumhaari umar se jyda chalta. Fir wahi CCD ke peeche waali canteen me Goel se treat leni exam time me, aur BBQ treats, bhai sab memories aise recall horhi ye likhte hue, kaafi mze kiye and hopefully jdli milenge aur mze krenge.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Arey humaare guitarist bhaiya !! Kaisa chal raha sab

 Bhai mulaakat to apni shuru me hi hogyi thi, uske baad jo sath me baithke gaane sunna, nye nye gaane share krna, right-left swipe krna, tere liye bandi dhundna. Summers me tujhe uthaane aana pdta tha tere room me, bc soya rehta tha 4 Top me the jab ekdm tera corner waala room, uske baad 5 Mid me aaye tb to apne room se jyda tere room me pda rehta tha mai.

But at the end of the day, recalling all those memories make it feel ki IT WAS WORTH IT. Ab to tum Delhi aagye, milna asaan hogya hai bas lockdown hat jaaye aate hain tumse milne. Aur bc "CCD WAALI TREAT" kb dega XD.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Jassiiiiii, bro kitna mast banda hai tu !!
Same hi hall aur same hi branch thi to jyda issue hue ni milne me XD, but fir teri kissey kahaniyaan sunna jb kbhi mess me milte the kaafi mast lgta tha.
Baaki courses vgrh ki baat to hoti hi rehti hai, sath me teepna courses me, ye sb to chalta hi raha.

But tu hai kaafi hi accha banda, hmesha chill rehne waala and I hope aisa hi rhega. Milte hain kbhi jldi brooo
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Dipak Broooo !!

Kaafi mast banda hai yaar tu, though jyda memories nhi bn paayi apni, but IT'S NEVER LATE, jitni memories thi kaafi sahi, tumhaare room me aake tere bed pe pde rehna, gaane sunna. Aur PUBG ke liye nightouts kon bhul skta XD.
Wing trips, fir jb NH-91 gye the to yaad hai selfie lena to bahaana tha but peeche waali ldki ki pic leni thi, bhai kya gazab karnaame kiye, uske baad jaha bhi treat pe gye ya mall ghumne gye, waha GHUMKE AATE HAIN CHAL ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. Kaash aisi hi mast memories banti rhegi jb milenge.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Bro
I remember hum orientation ke time mile the, mai tere se piche waali row me baitha tha aur kisi se puch raha tha ki "Yaar MTH ka to koi banda mila hi ni mujhe", tb tune bola tha "Mai hu MTH me", tbhi we met.

Although jyada memories to nahi hain, but I do remember ki hum log tere paas hi aate the assignments ke liye XD, aur tu fir mehnat lgaake ki hui assignment dedeta tha. Kaafi sahi banda lga mujhe jitna bhi time spend kiya and hoping to meet you soon. Take care tb tk !
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Mudreka bro !!

Shayad 1 ya 2 hi memories hain LOL, pehli baar tb baat hui thi jb jaa rhe the library se faculty building kisi shitty MTH course ke marks dekhne, tb sath me gye the XD. Uske alaawa kbhi kbhi library me baat hui. But chill hai, kaafi mast banda lga tu. Hope to meet sometime in future.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Bhaiiiii, tujhe to mai waise Kota se hi jaanta hu, same hostel hi to tha apna. But Kota me kbhi baat hui nahi, yaha aake fir baat hui aur kaafi accha dost ban gya tu. Library me sath me baithke pdhna, fir CC canteen aur DoAA canteen me jaake snacks khaana sath me. Fir academic area me exams time me raat ko ghumna sath me, bitching krna, aur duniya bhar ki baatein krna, kaafi sahi experience tha bhai.

But abhi last me tum busy hue apni dur waali wing me, to thoda contact kam hogya, but still apni memories hmesha yaad rhengi bro. Hoping to meet you soon, aur contact bnaaye rkhna
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Bro, intern ke interviews ke time hi mila tha tu tb hi hui apni mulaakat. And I am glad ki sath me intern lgi apni, fir intern ke time jo managers aur mentors ke kissey share krna shaam ko call krke, kaafi sahi tha wo. Uske baad se to tu Buddy ban gya XD.

Ab job bhi sath me hi lgi hai bro, jldi se milte hain sath me, kaafi memories bnaani hain abhi to, aur fir XBOX to tu leke hi rhega XD. Hope ye lockdown khtm ho aur chalte hain bangalore.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Arey RajeshBhai !!! 

Kaafi chilled out banda hai yaar tu, with that dialogue of yours "Hojyga bro, chill maar". Ipad khareeda jrur tune hi tha but kaam wo sbke aaya XD, fir wo treats pe jaana, aur exam time me mera tere room pe aana ki bhai jldi se bta ye kaise hue, 15 min me jaana hai.

Ab tum to 1 saal aur rhoge IITK me, but umeed hai jldi milenge, treats ke liye and bakchodi goes without saying.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Areyyyyy Bhaiya !! Khair mujhe yaad to ni humaari mulaakat kaise hui, yaad ho to btaana jrur. But uske baad jo library poora group sath baithta tha aur exam se pehle ki dukhbhari yaadein, r**di rone aur jaise kaise ek dusre ko smjhaane ki try krna sab yaad rhega broo.

Uske baad online sem me jo saare karnaame failaaye humne, bhaiiiiiii, MTH ke 2 courses me A wo bhi ek hi sem me, issey jyda CHAAP kaise skte the hum, baaki to bro tu hmesha Go-to person raha jb bhi koi hlka fulka kaand hota tere room ka gate hi knock krta tha mai sbse pehle. Aur fir wo "Dhawal ki CCD waali treat" to hui hi nhi yaar ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚, pdhega to maarega bahut wo.

Anyway, end me jo Linear ne maari hai wo to kaise hi btau bro, but jo tune uss din call krke mann ko shaanti di na, mza hi aagya. Last but not the least BROOO HAI TU. #Haryanavi_Bois
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Bhai bhai bhai, tere jaisa bakchod banda shayad hi milega, bhai 1st year me to nhi ho paayi as such jyda baat, but jo 1st sem ke end me Kolkata Trip thi Science camp ke naam pe, aur uske baad to mast train me sath me aana jaana.

Tere hi ghar aajata tha mai raaste me, fir waha se mast sath me jaate the, aur wing ki to tu jaan hai bro, sbka mood kharaab hoga to SHREY bhaiya aake apni baaton aur karnaamo se mast mahaul krdenge. Hmesha Chill rehne waala banda, itna chill ki bc exam me 15 min baad jaata tha, tbhi to bola shuru me "tere jaisa bakchod banda shayad hi milega" XD.

Bas jo last return trip thi apni from Kanpur, uske baad to lockdown lag gya yaar, na mil paaye na jyda baat ho paayi but chill hai jyda dur nhi hai tu, milte hain jaldi hi aur wahi apni bakchodi ke kissey kuch nye aur puraane bharte hain dimaag me.
author: Aayush  Sharma

text:
Bro, tu kaafi mast banda mila IITK me. Sath me jo raatbhar PUBG khelte the, wo adrenaline rush aur fir sath me gym jaana, fir baad me to kaafi sahi group ban gya tha apna sath me fests vgrh me Hall 12 jaake dinner karna Dhawal Aditya inke sath.

Fir BBQ ki suddenly planned trip, tu mai Dhawal aur Divyanshu, kaafi sahi memories bnaayi hain bro. Also, tu hi to mera Go-to person tha jb bhi kuch kaam hota, mobile lena hai to Shubham se puchta hu, earphones lene hain shubham se puch ke aata hu.

Aur tera wo gaming setup, bro kaafi sahi tha. Waise ekdm chill bnda, kaafi helpful, aur mast mje kraane waala. Milte hain bro jldi !!!!
author: Aayush  Sharma
